name: A Succulent Story
description:
A Short Game about Succulents out in the Old West.

Controls: Arrows Keys to Move. X to Attack. Z to interact. C to Toggle Weapon. Double-Tap Arrows Keys to Sprint!

Features: 

-Ride cows! horses!

-Have showdowns!

-Explore a world!

- Wear a hat!

- Roleplay as a cactus!

Note: 1st Published Game. Still testing out if this works properly.

v. 02

- Reduced Train Times. Improved Instructions also.
